name: Soul Bounds
description:
Synopsis:

Soul Bounds is a challenging endless platformer where you'll have escape the clutches of the void, an ever-rising flow of afterlife destruction. Advancing only through jumps, you must strategize your every movement.

Key Features:
  • Move Only Through Jumping - Holding down on either side of the screen to charge your jumps you'll have to learn the distance and timing of every bound
  • An Endless Generating Experience - Traversing higher and higher each run will result in different layouts of platforms and ordeals
  • Rising Tension - An ascending entity with the intent of wiping your soul and memories of you from the face of existence
  •  Platform Types - With 3 different platform types to keep the flow of the game diverse and thrilling; having standard, shifting and phantom platforms to experience
  • Soul Coins - Earn coins through getting higher and higher score to be able to buy different souls and eventually themes!
Credits

Game Developer - Reece L. Jones

Programmers - Jack Yeomans, Avinash Naidu

Art - Ethan Dunnett
